original_text: When Leviathan breathes out loudly, bright light shines from its nose. Its eyes shine like the red sun at dawn. When Leviathan breathes out loudly, bright light shines from its nose. Its eyes shine like the red sun at dawn. When Leviathan breathes out loudly,
korean_text: 그것이 재채기를 한즉 빛을 발하고 그것의 눈은 새벽의 눈꺼풀 빛 같으며

sentences.original_text: bright light shines from its nose.
Its eyes shine like the red sun at dawn.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 눈은 새벽의 붉은 태양처럼 빛납니다.

sentences.original_text: bright light shines from its nose.
Its eyes shine like the red sun at dawn.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 눈은 새벽의 붉은 태양처럼 빛납니다.
